definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: (prob. associated by Heb. with I. [[עֵדֶן]]);—district in which lay garden of ´[[י]] home of Adam and Eve: [[וַיִּטַּע גַּן־בְּעֵדֶן]] Ge 2:8, river ´[[יׁחֵא מֵע]] v:Ge 2:10, ´[[קִדְמַת־ע]] Ge 4:16; ´[[גַּן־ע]] Ge 2:15, Ge 3:23, Ge 3:24 (all LXX Edem); cf. ´[[כְּגַן־ע]] Ez Eze 36:35, Joe 2:3 and ´[[כְּע]] Is 51:3 (‖´[[גַּן־י]]), all sim. of fertility; [[גַּן־אֱלֽהִים]] ´[[ע]] Ez Eze 28:13, [[אֲשֶׁר בְּגַן הָאֱלֽהַים]] ´[[עֲחֵי ע]] Eze 31:9, ´[[עֲחֵי ע]] v:Eze 31:16, v:Eze 31:18, v:Eze 31:18 (LXX Ez Jo h( trufh/; Is para/deisov).
